File_Description: Location of the Columbia River Basin (CRB); its sub-basins; and precipitation/temperature and land cover/use and elevation.

Variation of the modeled mean annual hyporheic zone respiration.

Variation of hydrologic and substrate variables in streams/rivers with different land uses.
